transcript: the salver lay some verses composed and print- ed in the hero's honor. Bagrati6n, on seeing the salver,glanced around in dismay, as though seek- ing help. But all eyes demanded that he should submit. Feeling himself in their power, he res- olutely took the salver with both hands and looked sternly and reproachfully at the count who had presented it to him.
